    • Constructor Detail

      • Villager

        public Villager(double x,
                double y,
                java.lang.String image_path,
                java.lang.String name,
                int maxHP,
                double speed)
         throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Creates a new villager within the game world.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x coordinate of the villager.
        y - The initial y coordinate of the villager.
        image_path - The location of the image to be used for the villager.
        name - The name of the villager.
        maxHP - useless here.
        speed - useless here.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
